title: Dogcatcher: A Short Story
description: Dogcatcher is a supernatural thriller set in rural Ireland. It tells the story of Samuel Legge, the village dogcatcher. He has recently received some news that has cast a shadow over his future. Added to that, a figure from his past now threatens the person he holds dearest. But Sam is nothing if not resourceful, and heâ€™s not the sort of man you want to back into a corner.
author: B.C. Hollywood
